recipe.title: Oysters with Nobu's Three Salsas
ingredients: 1/2 cup (10 g) finely chopped parsley leaves
1 cup (100 g) finely chopped Maui onion
instructions: Combine all the ingredients. Add the parsley just before use.
Make Maui Onion Salsa: Combine all ingredients.
Make Jalapeño Salsa: Combine all ingredients.

Assemble oysters: 1. Remove the oysters from their shells and rinse under cold water. Drain. 2. Arrange the oysters in their shells on a serving dish lined with crushed ice and top with a little of each salsa — i.e. four oysters per salsa. 3. Sprinkle the chives over the Maui Onion Salsa.
